about.title: About
about.content: Over 6 years of experience in software development and holds a degree in IT from Fatec. Impacted projects across logistics and financial services, serving clients such as Banco ABC, Flash, XP Inc., and TOTVS, with a focus on delivering robust and efficient interfaces. Contributions include developing applications for companies like Gol Airlines, one of Brazil's largest airlines, and Teleperformance, a global leader in customer service solutions with over 500,000 employees worldwide. Emphasizes performance and usability in his work, alongside seamless integration with ERP systems, driving impactful technological solutions.

base39.title: Founder Team & Staff Engineer
base39.description: Leading front-end development, optimizing web performance, and mentoring developers. Collaborating with product and design teams to build scalable internal platforms and financial solutions.

paketa.title: Software Engineer
paketa.description: Developed and maintained internal platforms focused on payroll-deductible credit solutions. Worked on user management systems, corporate portals, and dashboards with real-time metrics.

essencia.title: Frontend Developer
essencia.description: Developed scalable applications using React and Wordpress. Contributed to internal systems, e-commerce platforms, and custom web solutions for clients, including an internal support system for a major airline.

optera.title: Junior Software Engineer
optera.description: Built MVPs and participated in agile sprints. Worked on real estate platforms, an ERP for small and medium businesses, and a broadband plan comparison tool.
